titles.title: Employee Educational Assistance Act of 1997
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the exclusion for employer-provided educational assistance.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/9/1997--Introduced. Employee Educational Assistance Act of 1997 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the income tax exclusion of amounts paid under employee educational assistance programs.
